content:
Here are 10 potential feature ideas to improve the Instagram account of Yemek.com:

1. User-generated content: Encourage followers to share their own food-related photos and tag your account. You could also create a branded hashtag for users to use.
2. Behind-the-scenes content: Share behind-the-scenes glimpses of your kitchen, recipe development process, or other aspects of your business to give followers a unique look at what goes on behind the scenes.
3. Recipe videos: Create short recipe videos that show the steps for preparing various dishes. These could be featured on your Instagram account as well as on your YouTube channel.
4. Food challenges: Host food challenges or recipe contests for your followers to participate in. This could be a fun way to engage with your audience and generate new content.
5. Food trends: Keep an eye on emerging food trends and share your thoughts on them with your followers.
6. Collaborations: Collaborate with other food-related accounts or influencers to create new content and potentially reach a wider audience.
7. Food-themed Instagram stories: Use Instagram stories to share quick, behind-the-scenes glimpses of your kitchen, recipes, or other food-related content.
8. User polls: Create polls or surveys to gather feedback from your followers and learn more about what they're interested in.
9. Food-related news: Share interesting food-related news or articles with your followers.
10. Special promotions: Offer special promotions or discounts to your followers as a way to thank them for their support and encourage them to continue following your account.
